description: czastrwania" is a post_tag in the Polish language. This tag can be used in WordPress to categorize or label content that revolves around the concept of "czas trwania" which translates to "duration" in English. When applied to a WordPress post, this tag helps organize and classify content related to the length or time span of various events, processes, activities, or phenomena. By using this post_tag, visitors can easily find and navigate through content specifically addressing the duration of different subjects, ensuring a more efficient and user-friendly experience on the website.
name: czas trwania
